price: 158. Al-lah lo ascendió a Él (en vida). Y Al-lah es Poderoso y Sabio.
arabic: بَل رَّفَعَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيۡهِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: bal rafaʿahu al-lahu ilayhi wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
